body: When you deal damage with a weapon that you are wielding two-handed, you add 1-1/2 times your Strength bonus (Strength penalties are not multiplied). You don't get this higher Strength bonus, however, when using a light weapon with two hands.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Combat/Combat Statistics/Damage/Strength Bonus/Wielding a Weapon Two-Handed
name: Wielding a Weapon Two-Handed
